dataList.title: Blade Lineage?
dataList.content: ... Haah. Hah.
Bamboo-hatted Kim kneeled and caught his breath. Something began to shimmer behind him.
This is a dungeon—A Mirror Dungeon of the Fathoms.
This is just like the Dingdong's Bar & Fryers, huh?
It's 'Eunbong's', Gregor. 'Eunbong's'...
He has already entered the dungeon.
Haah... so we've got to follow the bloke, eh?
<Yeah... we were ordered to secure the Distortion as well. So...>
... An immense, heavy sensation emanates from within that space.
<That 'Monolith' has to be somewhere in there, too.>

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: ... Let us follow.
While she was clearly dumbfounded by the turn of events, I could tell that she was determined to see this to the end. We had nothing more to add.
Advancing.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: This is...
This place has taken the likeness of S Corp...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Not just anywhere in S Corp.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: You call this place the 'fathoms of ego'...? It appears that mentor Bamboo-hatted Kim's memories are... affecting this place.
Is there aught from his past that you are aware of?

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: No... nothing in detail. I don't believe I have the right to divulge a depiction of his past based on hearsay, either.
Aeng-du continued in a morose tone.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: When he appeared so suddenly at this building...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: ... I don't suppose he had much trouble cutting down the Kurokumo Clan henchmen.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: I am certain he was flanked by competent men and women. It would not have mattered how many henchmen they threw against the mentor; nothing short of a Kurokumo Clan officer could have given him any trouble. In fact, I surmise that he would have been able to cut down a hundred of their men on his own.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: But...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Not all those who accompanied master Bamboo-hatted Kim were as powerful as he. His capabilities lie far beyond our own.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: His fellows must have fallen one by one before the endless onslaught of the Kurokumo Clan henchmen.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: And... I cannot help but imagine that the sight must have reminded him of a rather tragic event in his past.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: An unpleasant event that likely shook mentor Bamboo-hatted Kim to the core.
That alone fits numerous criteria that make it ripe for a manifestation of a Distortion. He was in a very receptive state to the Monolith's influences as well.

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: So that is how... the mentor became beholden to his blade. Like a fiend...

dataList.title: Blade Lineage
dataList.content: Yet... still... how could he...
We remained wordless and advanced as Aeng-du despondently muttered to herself.
It was all silent, save for the sound of our shoes lightly pressing into the soft soil beneath our feet.
